reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's great navy color, soft texture, and warmth, with one noting it's thick enough to keep you warm. The fit and size receive mixed feedback - while some find it a great fit, others say it's too tight, and while some find it flattering, one customer mentions it's not suitable for saggy necks. The quality is positive, with one customer noting it's high-quality for the price, though there are co

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater!!
items.body: Love love love this sweater! Fits true to size. Great quality. I washed it quite a few times and still looks brand new. I did not dry it, I laid it over the back of my chair to dry. Very soft and thick enough to keep you warm during the cold months. At first, I wasn't sure about buying a turtleneck but I can't say enough good things about this sweater. The front is just a touch short than the back, which doesn't bother me. I tend to tuck my shirts in the front anyhow. Read more
items.author: Tina K.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: These arrived in those shrink wrap packages that always makes clothes look wrinkled. However, I hung it up for a day or two and all the wrinkles came out and it looked great. Very high-quality for the price and I actually ended up ordering another one in a different color.. runs true to size Read more
items.author: SeaMerSC

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ok
items.body: I like the sleeve gold buttons and coloring. But not as flattering as I thought it be. I’ll try to pair with leggings and long jacket and it’ll be ok. Also wrinkles were extremely hard to get out, so don’t be surprised when you get it. Read more
items.author: Chris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great!
items.body: So soft! Has a nice stretch to it! A good medium thickness, meaning its not thin where its see through but also not very thick for stormy col night! I’d say the perfect fall sweater that has a nice slim fit! Read more
items.author: Almedina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit perfect
items.body: This fits very well & the perfect design. Bought it in 3 colors Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Soft but fell apart before washing
items.body: I wore this to church, such soft fabric. I pulled on the neck and it the whole turtle neck came unraveled! I had to run to the bathroom. Definitely not a good purchase. Such a shame! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sweater looks high end!
items.body: This sweater is a lightweight knit. Mine seemed a bit small but it is very stretchy and slinky. Even when stretched it returns back to size which makes it very form fitting so be sure to check your size. I ordered white but it is not a brilliant white, more like an off white but still very flattering. Read more
items.author: Rosemary Williams

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Think twice before buying
items.body: Loved the top half of this sweater, the material and the buttons. The bottom is misshaped. It bags out making it difficult to wear out of your pants or tucked in. I was going to return but missed my window. I wish it was the same length all the way around and not short in the front long in the back. I equally wish it was narrower at the bottom. Disappointed I missed the return window because I’m not happy with it. Read more
items.author: dm

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Snowflakes Red, Apricot, Colorblock Camel, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Colorblock Khaki, Red, Wine Red, Khaki, White, Beige, Apricot Polka Dots. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
